results.name: DubiEx
results.description: DubiEx is a fully decentralized exchange that i
results.fullDescription: DubiEx is a fully decentralized exchange that is unique due to its truly trustless peer-to-peer nature and unique features such as zero-fee trading with a simple and user-friendly UI as well as easy and free token creation. Run by volunteers and activists, DubiEx' greatest advantage is that it is not maintained for profit but rather with the intention of helping advance the ways in which cryptocurrency can make a positive difference in the world. This is what allows DubiEx to develop specific features and pursue decentralization to extents that, on other exchanges, would undermine their ability to sustain their business model. Users can trade any token for any other token straight from their own Ethereum wallet, no deposit required. DubiEx supports limit and market orders as well as filling and canceling multiple trades in one go to save extra gas costs. By providing a simple and advanced mode, DubiEx is accessible to advanced traders and newcomers alike.

results.name: Poexer
results.description: Poexer is a Decentralized Cryptocurrency Exchange
results.fullDescription: Poexer is a Decentralized Cryptocurrency Exchange (powered by an autonomous smart-contract) which allows you to trade Ethereum for POX and POEX tokens. POX and POEX tokens are ERC-20 tokens with a clever twist: Every POX and POEX holder receives direct earnings in Ethereum every time that anyone else buys, sells or transfers the token based on the amounts of tokens.

results.name: MyCryptons
results.description: MyCryptons uses ERC-721 tokens to populate an alte
results.fullDescription:
MyCryptons uses ERC-721 tokens to populate an alternative reality world of famous personalities where players can collect unique digital personalities called "Cryptons", engage in political expression and social media interaction through their Cryptons and play their Cryptons in games and competitions on the platform.

Each Crypton is beautifully represented by a unique handcrafted image and has a short edgy gagline which owners can personalize and share on social media. 

Cryptons can be snatched by other users if they pay the price set by the Smart Contract but owners can also buy protection and are able to set their own snatch price. Owners of Cryptons will also share in revenue from games and activities that involve their Cryptons.

Cryptons represent game pieces in the Social Media 4.0 environment we are creating.

results.description: Multilevel Referral is a completely new concept in
results.fullDescription:
Multilevel Referral is a completely new concept in the blockchain gaming arena where the entire gameplay pivots around referring people to the game and earn ethers for every referral (direct and indirect referrals upto 4 levels). 

The game is pretty similar to any other multi-level pyramid scheme but instead of selling any virtual product, it works on selling the referrals itself. You just need to follow two simple steps and you can see an exponential growth in your earnings very soon.

results.name: EMONT Frenzy: Collect EMONT!
results.description: EMONT Frenzy - a Blockchain game of EMONT Alliance
results.fullDescription:
EMONT Frenzy - a Blockchain game of EMONT Alliance, running on the decentralized Ethereum network. Join the epic battle of Ether monsters underwater.

EMONT is an in-game currency for all games in the EMONT Alliance. It is an ERC-20 token and currently traded via https://app.radarrelay.com/EMONT/WETH.

In EMONT Frenzy game, you have a fish which loves collecting EMONT. It can attack and kill smaller fish to get EMONT. But do avoid bigger fish as they will eat you up!

results.name: Crypto DM
results.description: Crypto DM is a decentralized payment and messaging
results.fullDescription:
Crypto DM is a decentralized payment and messaging tool for creators, gamers and social media stars that empowers them to directly monetize their audiences, receiving Ether donations and messages from fans in just three clicks. 
 
The vision behind Crypto DM is to provide an unmediated financial and messaging link between creators and their followers.  Unlike platform-dictated monetization models with continually shifting revenue formulas, Crypto DM allows creators – whether they’re a Twitch gamer or a YouTube personality – to generate revenue entirely on their own terms.  And fans gain a new way to message and support their favorite social stars.

results.name: DopeRaider
results.description: DopeRaider is an RPG about underground drug busine
results.fullDescription:
DopeRaider is an RPG about underground drug business in a world with a unique economy.

Players begin their life as a Narco with a individual skill-set in one of the diverse seven districts. By performing various actions, Narcos can earn more respect in town, opening up more possibilities like buying better equipment, changing identity and recruiting new Narcos.

Narcos can make their living by growing weed, processing cocaine, trading product at district markets or by raiding each other.

results.name: DCup
results.description: DCup.io is an innovative World Cup prediction DApp
results.fullDescription: DCup.io is an innovative World Cup prediction DApp built on Ethereum blockchain. Designed to tackle key challenges of conventional prediction games, it aims to drive mainstream adoption and become a killer app on Ethereum network. Starting with the World Cup prediction, our vision is to develop a wider ecosystem and unite fans around the world into one community. DCup is part of DHub ecosystem

results.name: ETHimals - Your Blockchain Pet!
results.description: An ETHimal is a creature that lives on the Ethereu
results.fullDescription: An ETHimal is a creature that lives on the Ethereum network. Randomly generated blockchain DNA makes for literally billions of unique creatures waiting to be created. They need to be fed and interacted with to stay alive, making ETHimals a great blockchain learning platform! ETHimals can hold assets of their own, live in environments of your choosing and battle others to win great prizes!

 The more damage you do, the better chance you have of winning an additional PRIME LOOT. Check the leaderboards to see where you stand.  Each day a jackpot winner takes home the bounty!

results.name: EtherStrike
results.description: EtherStrike is a game of strategy in which players
results.fullDescription: EtherStrike is a game of strategy in which players go head-to-head in planetary battle as they attempt to conquer the crypto-universe. Like many predecessors, planets are collectible tokens which may be bought or sold; however, unlike games before it, EtherStrike planets are functional war machines! Use them to attack, or harvest their resources and sell them on the marketplace for ETH! Will you Own the Universe?

results.name: dAppBridge
results.description: dAppBridge is a service to bridge the gap between
results.fullDescription:
dAppBridge is a service to bridge the gap between smart contracts and the public Internet. With a simple call to dAppBridge you can can interface with any public API or URL - with secure proof that the data returned has not been tampered with.

dAppBridge also provided additional services such as Random Number generation and Cryptographic Random String generation - again with secure proof that the return values have not been tempered with and are as you requested.
